amendment.description: To provide for a transfer of funds to the Bureau of Reclamation of conduct a feasibility study for the purposes of providing water to Park City and the Snyderville Basin, Utah.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1690 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1690 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S11539; text: CR S111539) To provide for a transfer of funds to the Bureau of Reclamation of conduct a feasibility study for the purposes of providing water to Park City and the Snyderville Basin, Utah.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1690 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Bennett.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1690 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
